answers.text: The switch statement may be an alternative for multiple if statements
The switch statement is the same as the for loop
The switch statement must always contain a default case

quizzes.question: Which of the following is true for the switch statement?

answers.text: a && b is false if both a and b are true
(a || b ) && c is true if c is true and either a or b is true
a || b is true if either a or b is true
a && b is true if either a or b is true

quizzes.question: Select the correct statements about && and || operators.
